description: Explore the transformative model of decentralized governance in open source communities, highlighting its impact on technological innovation and community engagement. Understand the benefits and challenges, supported by real-world examples like the Linux Kernel, Apache Software Foundation, and Ethereum.
keywords: decentralized governance, open source, innovation, community engagement, Linux Kernel, Apache Software Foundation, Ethereum, decentralized autonomous organizations, blockchain
title: Decentralized Governance in Open Source: Bridging Innovation and Community
